comment.author: 93235920@N04
comment._content: Picture could have been taken from the Fort George or the prison looking over the harbor or st. Georges. In the right peninsula is another fort, Fort Fredrick, What looks like a compass on the ground is where the botanical gardens were located.

comment.author: 93235920@N04
comment._content: Sendall tunnel is under that peninsula connecting two water fronts. Still in use today. The General hospital is located next to the Fort Fredrick.
